com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.domain

Interface WebCmsMultiDomainService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WebCmsDomainService

    public interface WebCmsMultiDomainService
extends WebCmsDomainService
    Central API for working with a multi-domain context.
    Since:
    0.0.3
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    WebCmsMultiDomainConfiguration

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.domain.WebCmsDomainService

        getDomain, getDomainByKey

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentDomain

        WebCmsDomain getCurrentDomain()
        Always returns the current domain, bound to the WebCmsDomainContextHolder. This method will return a single domain only or none.
        Returns:
        domain or null

      • getCurrentDomainMetadata

        <U> U getCurrentDomainMetadata(Class<U> metadataType)
        Return the metadata for the current domain. Can be null if not metadata is available. A ClassCastException will be thrown if the metadata is not of the right type.
        Type Parameters:
        U - metadata type reference
        Parameters:
        metadataType - the metadata should have
        Returns:
        metadata or null if none available

      • getCurrentDomainForEntity

        WebCmsDomain getCurrentDomainForEntity(Object entity)
        Returns the current domain for a particular entity. This is basically the same as getCurrentDomain() if the call of isDomainBound(Object) returns true.

        If the entity type is not domain-bound, this will always return null.

        Parameters:
        entity - for which to retrieve the current domain
        Returns:
        domain or null

      • getCurrentDomainForType

        WebCmsDomain getCurrentDomainForType(Class<?> entityType)
        Returns the current domain for a particular entity type. This is basically the same as getCurrentDomain() if the call of isDomainBound(Class) returns true.

        If the entity type is not domain-bound, this will always return null.

        Parameters:
        entityType - for which to retrieve the current domain
        Returns:
        domain or null

      • getMetadataForDomain

        <U> U getMetadataForDomain(WebCmsDomain domain,
                           Class<U> metadataType)
        Retrieve the metadata for a specific domain. Coerce it to the given type. A ClassCastException will be thrown if the metadata is not of the right type.
        Specified by:
        getMetadataForDomain in interface WebCmsDomainService
        Parameters:
        domain - or null for the no-domain
        metadataType - type the metadata should have
        Returns:
        metadata or null if none available

      • isDomainBound

        boolean isDomainBound(Object entity)
        Check if a particular entity is domain-bound according to the current WebCmsMultiDomainConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        entity - to check
        Returns:
        true if domain-bound

      • isDomainBound

        boolean isDomainBound(Class<?> entityType)
        Check if a particular entity type is domain-bound according to the current WebCmsMultiDomainConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        entityType - to check
        Returns:
        true if domain-bound

      • isNoDomainAllowed

        boolean isNoDomainAllowed(Object entity)
        Check if a particular entity does not require a specific domain. This will be true for either non-domain bound entities, of for domain-bound entities that also allow no-domain.
        Parameters:
        entity - to check
        Returns:
        true if no-domain is allowed

      • isNoDomainAllowed

        boolean isNoDomainAllowed(Class<?> entityType)
        Check if a particular entity type does not require a specific domain. This will be true for either non-domain bound entities, of for domain-bound entities that also allow no-domain.
        Parameters:
        entityType - to check
        Returns:
        true if no-domain is allowed

      • attachDomainContext

        CloseableWebCmsDomainContext attachDomainContext(WebCmsDomain domain)
        Create a new WebCmsDomainContext for the given domain, and attach it to the WebCmsDomainContextHolder. This will load the metadata, create the context and effectively change the value of getCurrentDomain().

        This method returns an AutoCloseable referring the previous domain context. When calling the CloseableWebCmsDomainContext.close(), the previous domain context will be reset.

        Parameters:
        domain - to set
        Returns:
        closeable

      • isCurrentDomain

        boolean isCurrentDomain(WebCmsDomain domain)
        Test if a specific domain is the current domain bound tot the thread.
        Parameters:
        domain - to test
        Returns:
        true if the domain is indeed the current domain
